extendedInfo.description: This is a free version of Child Vaccination application.Keep record of your children vaccinations. You can enter each vaccination date, type, and custom note. Application will track due and overdue vaccinations for the US/UK residents.Each vaccine category (pending, administered, scheduled, overdue) is displayed with different background color.All vaccines recommended in the US and UK are bundled, but custom vaccines can be entered.Custom notes can be entered.The application supports multiple children. The record can be exported to a SD card.Consider upgrading to the paid version for the following features:Vaccination records can be sorted by administered date or by vaccine type.Detailed explanation of each vaccine.e-mail records.Filter out administered and pending records to see just due and overdue records.IMPORTANT: If you are upgrading from free version, please export data from the free version to the SD card and import it into the application. If you uninstall the application, all data will be lost, therefore it is important to back it up to the SD card.

reviews.title: Very useful
reviews.comment: It help me to keep track my child\'s vaccine schedule, and history
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Could be useful
reviews.comment: Beyond the spelling errors ... what is a \'doze\'? The popup to remind me to purchase the full version every is very, very intrusive. The date widget to input the dates doesn\'t allow for pure numbers, which is awkward.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No info
reviews.comment: Does nt tell u anything untilu pay i guess
reviews.author: A Google User
